title: Jungle Sloth
character: Zee, a slow-moving but brave green sloth who swings through the jungle with a big smile and curious eyes

pages.image_prompt: Zee the sloth swinging on a vine in a bright green jungle canopy, smiling, with birds and monkeys watching, children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image
tropical leaf border with small animals peeking out, children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text:
Sound out: run, big, red, hot, pop, drip, get, hiss
Know these: the, said, to, I, was
New words: vines, canopy, jungle, swing
pages.image_prompt: word list with tiny icons: fire for 'hot', raindrop for 'drip', snake for 'hiss', vine for 'swing', children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image
